messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling Dads
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/28/2000 12:43:29 PM Central Daylight Time, ... The list is actually a folder on Unschooling.com message boards.  Try this link,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/28/2000 12:43:29 PM Central Daylight Time,
stevef@... writes:

> Can someone tell me how to get to the unschooling dads list? My wife
> told me there is a new group dedicated to unschooling dads.
>
> Thanks,
> Steve
>

The list is actually a folder on Unschooling.com message boards. Try this
link, <A HREF="http://www.unschooling.com/discus/messages/board-topics.html">U
nschooling.com's Message Boards</A>
(www.unschooling.com/discus/messages/board-topic)
Unschooling Dads is the 4th folder down.

Carron

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling Dads
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Steve Falbe  To:  Sent: Monday, August 28, 2000 1:40 PM Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom]
messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Steve Falbe <stevef@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, August 28, 2000 1:40 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling Dads


> Can someone tell me how to get to the unschooling dads list? My wife
> told me there is a new group dedicated to unschooling dads.

You need to go to www.unschooling.com. Go to the message boards. It's the
4th one listed.

Amy
Mom to Samantha, Dana, and Casey
